title: Sax True Flow Heavy Body Acrylic Paint, 1/2 Gallon, Mars Black - 439298, 64.2 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
description: Sax True Flow Acrylics are ideal for your art room. This paint dries to a matte finish and is ideal for traditional acrylic painting as well as block printing or silk screening. It offers excellent flow, coverage, blending, and drying. Cleans up with soap and water. Packaged in durable plastic bottles. Not recommended for outdoor use. Pumps sold separately.
